docs.title: About
docs.text: This site captures computer related knowledge of my interest. My intent is to use the site as a central repository to search when I need a reminder on how to do something.

docs.title: How to Create a self-signed SSL certificate
docs.text:
1. Generate a private Key

    openssl genrsa -des3 -out server.key 2048

  2. Generate a Certificate Signing Request (CSR)

    openssl req -new server.key -out server.csr

  3. Remove Passphrase

    cp server.key server.key.saved
openssl rsa -in server.key.saved -out server.key

  4. Generate self-signed cert

    openssl x509 -req -days 365 -in server.cer -signkey server.key -out server.crt
